meanings.definition: A type of fabric with raised parallel cords.
meanings.sent1: The repps felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of colorful repps.
meanings.sent3: The repps fabric made a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The repps material added texture to the design.
meanings.sent5: The repps pattern stood out among the smooth fabrics.

meanings.definition: To weave or make fabric with raised parallel cords.
meanings.sent1: She carefully repps the threads together.
meanings.sent2: The artisan repps the fabric with skill.
meanings.sent3: He tried to repps the cords but got tangled up.

meanings.sent5: Watching her repps the fabric was mesmerizing.
